creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: recto: abstract image with black cruciform shape with round element at left with red segment against blue ground; purple triangle with wavy top edges, LLC; black and grey wavy form at right against turquoise ground with salmon at top right; "ART-COUPON" in LRC on a tiny certificate-like element; verso: typewritten text and numbers/scratch paper
medium: Colored pencil (?) and ink on paper
title: Untitled ["Art Coupon"]
